timeline.message:
[FLINK-19237] Fix rejected slot offer bug in JobMaster

The JobMaster was rejecting slot offers from TaskExecutors erroneously in cases where the TaskExecutor ID is reused.

This fixes the JobMaster.suspend() behavior to do proper bookkeeping of TaskExecutors.
